snippet.title: [Lord of Heroes] Official trailer
snippet.description:
It's your turn to take command!

Take up the throne as monarch of Avillon
and revolutionize the world!
Legendary heroes are awaiting your arrival!

▶ Download(Android/iOS): https://bit.ly/3hjJLK0
▶ Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LordofHeroes.Global
▶ Official website: https://www.lordofheroes.com
